pageContext.description: L 105 mm; W bt 51.3; T 1.5; Tbt 0.6; L rivets 8.0; d. rivet heads 8.0-9.2; L sep. rivets 9.2-1.05., Typology: v. thin but flattened butt; two small central notches original; tailing-off bevel along short sides of hilt-plate forming rounded edge; W hilt line preserved in diffe[...] condition., Manufacture: gmks along axis of blade preserved in patina at hilt only; traces of score marks along W hilt line both a p. edge and inset a little into blade; doming of some rivet heads a little irregular., Condition: edges b. fine + sharp, v. small nnicks may be original; has cracks across blade sl. [...] it - poss. ancient? v. bl. tip broken off - prob in ant.; butt intact., Surface: green p. entact only at hilt; rest removed to sl. [...] sve. Separate rivets: [...] green sl. rough surface.  Small [...] high on one blade face.
pageContext.site: NORTH YORKSHIRE, (EAST RIDING),, LUTTONS, (HEEPERTHORPE), ESHâ€™S ROUND BARROW,Greenwell Barrow XLIX
